meanings.definition: A type of small jumping insect that feeds on plants.
meanings.sent1: The psyllas hopped from leaf to leaf in the garden.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of psyllas on the rose bush.
meanings.sent3: The psyllas seemed to be having a tiny picnic on the daisy.
meanings.sent4: The psyllas were like tiny acrobats on the green stage of the garden.
meanings.sent5: The psyllas' tiny legs propelled them through the air with grace.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'psylla', referring to multiple individuals of the insect species.
meanings.sent1: Look at all the psyllas on the plant!
meanings.sent2: The psyllas were a colorful sight in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The psyllas gathered for a miniature parade on the stem.
meanings.sent4: The psyllas covered the leaves like a tiny blanket.
meanings.sent5: The psyllas' tiny bodies created a moving mosaic on the flower.
